entry.title: Sunday night: A few showers. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: A few showers ending this evening then partly cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 5:24 PM PDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. 30 percent chance of flurries over northern sections early in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High 8. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:24 PM PDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early in the evening. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening. Forecast issued 5:24 PM PDT Sunday 9 April 2023
